options.description: Handle OPTIONS request for announcements collection

post.description:
Create new announcement.
Requires admin or manager role.

get.description:
Retrieve announcements.
Regular users only see published, non-expired, non-soft-deleted announcements.
Managers and admins see all their announcements (published and drafts) that are not soft deleted or expired.
Supports optional filtering by category and search in title/description.

Retrieve published announcements.
All users can see published, non-expired, non-soft-deleted announcements.
Supports optional filtering by category and search in title/description.

Get announcement by ID.
Regular users can only access published, non-expired, non-soft-deleted announcements.
Managers/admins can access all their announcements that are not soft deleted or expired.

put.description:
Update an announcement.
Requires admin or manager role.

delete.description:
Delete an announcement (soft delete).
Requires admin role.
